item.title: Add OpenAPI.security
item.description: https://openapi.security/ - Free tool to quickly check the security of any OpenAPI / Swagger based API. No signup required.

item.title: tool made for developers
item.description: https://www.erdlab.io) — Free cloud based entity relationship diagram (ERD - — Free cloud based entity relationship diagram (ERD) tool made for developers.

item.title: Add EForw to Email
item.description: https://www.eforw.com - Free email forwarding for 1 domain. Receive and send emails from your domain.

item.title: Add Meteosource Weather API
item.description: https://www.meteosource.com/ - API](https://www.meteosource.com/) — global weather API for current and forecasted weather data. Forecasts are based on a machine learning combination of more weather models to achieve better accuracy. Free plan comes with 400 calls per day.

item.title: Update Koyeb
item.description:
https://www.divio.com/ - A platform to manage cloud application deploying only using Docker. Available free subscription for development projects. Requires card and no custom domain support.
https://www.koyeb.com - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Koyeb provides two nano services to run your apps with its forever-free tier and also sponsors open-source projects with free resources. The free plan requires card information.

item.title: adds Tinybird to DBaaS
item.description: https://tinybird.co - A serverless managed ClickHouse with connection-less data ingest over HTTP and let's you publish SQL queries as managed HTTP APIs. No time limit on free-tier, 10GB storage + 1000 API requests per day.

item.title: Change Fingerprintjs description to single line
item.description: https://www.fingerprint.com - Fingerprinting](https://www.fingerprint.com) - FingerprintJS is a browser fingerprinting library that queries browser attributes and computes a hashed visitor identifier from them. Unlike cookies and local storage, a fingerprint stays the same in incognito/private mode and even when browser data is purged. Free tier version of Pro has 20,000 Requests per month.

item.title: Add FingerprintJS under Security and PKI
item.description: https://www.fingerprint.com - Fingerprinting](https://www.fingerprint.com) - FingerprintJS is a browser fingerprinting library that queries browser attributes and computes a hashed visitor identifier from them. Unlike cookies and local storage, a fingerprint stays the same in incognito/private mode and even when browser data is purged.
